scripts.start: npm run start-website-local && npm run test ; wait && npm run stop-website-local
scripts.start-website-local: sudo cp ../website/node-local.service /etc/systemd/system && sudo systemctl daemon-reload && sudo systemctl start node-local.service
scripts.stop-website-local: sudo systemctl stop node-local.service && sudo rm /etc/systemd/system/node-local.service
